channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: I’m 77. Despite my $1.4 million wealth, my expenses exceed my income. Do I sell stocks to pay off my mortgage?
item.description: “I started my own tax-preparation and representation firm. My annual revenue is $60,000 before taxes.”

item.title: We’re in our 70s. How do we withdraw $6 million from our retirement fund without getting killed on taxes?
item.description: “Some of the stocks pay dividends totaling around $90,000 annually.”

item.title: ‘It’s getting scary close to retirement’: We’re 70. We have no debt, no stocks and $275K in savings. Are we in trouble?
item.description: “We will have $4,300 a month in Social Security.”

item.title: Forget the wealthy. Why this value manager is betting on average Americans, and the stocks he’s buying now.
item.description: Smead Capital Management’s Bill Smead says when the market correction eventually comes, wealthy Americans won’t help investors’ portfolios.

item.title: Are you feeling stressed about money? The big banks say you’re not acting like it.
item.description: JPMorgan’s CFO says while there’s a lot of uncertainty and the economy has slowed, ‘the facts say’ consumers and the economy are just fine

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...
